alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued June 07 at 10:05AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Air Quality Alert in effect until midnight Thursday... The Michigan Department of Environment, Great Lakes, and Energy has declared today (June 7) and tomorrow (June 8)...to be Action Days for elevated levels of smoke. Pollutants are expected to be in the unhealthy for sensitive groups range. The Action Day is in effect for the following Michigan counties... St. Joseph, Branch, and Hillsdale counties. People and businesses are urged to avoid activities which lead to smoke formation. It is recommended that active children and adults...and persons with respiratory diseases such as asthma...limit prolonged outdoor exertion. For more information visit our website at weather.gov/iwx && For further information...please see the Michigan Department of Environment, Great Lakes, and Energy page at... http://www.michigan.gov/EGLE.
